phrs.translation: 犯罪学者, 犯罪学家, 刑事学家

sentences.sentence: Criminologist Dr. Ann Jones has linked the crime to social circumstances.
sentences.translation: 犯罪学家安·琼斯博士认为这起犯罪与社会环境有关。

sentences.sentence: Cesare Lombroso (1835-1909) was an Italian anthropologist, criminologist and jurist.
sentences.translation: 龙勃罗梭(1835 - 1909)意大利人类学家、犯罪学家和-法学家。

sentences.sentence: "Copycat crimes do occur," said Jeffrey Ian Ross, a criminologist at the University of Baltimore.
sentences.translation: 美国巴尔的摩大学的刑事学家杰弗里·罗斯(Jeffrey Ian Ross)说：“模仿性犯罪发生了”。
